modName: Dark Souls III - Farron Greatsword and Dagger - DELETED
summary: Can't get enough of Dark Souls weapons? Then this mod is for you!
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000]The file was removed from skyrim special edition NM page for "ported content". So it will be available for regular Skyrim only.[/color]

Added two new weapons:
Farron Greatsword
Farron Dagger

They can be both crafted at any forge, under ebony smithing.
Same materials and same damage, nothing OP, made for Vanilla Skyrim.

[size=3]I plan to add even more weapons in the future.
If you have any requests, do so in the comments section.[/size]

Also available atÂ [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=956184116]Steam Workshop[/url]. There's a collection I made there, that I'll be adding more weapons soon.

Credits:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/darksouls/users/37230120]dacds[/url] - For exporting the weapons from DSIII
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/darksouls/users/3992452/?]Me[/url] - Porting to Skyrim
author: Dragonyck
